commands.name: az network vhub route-map rule add
commands.syntax:
az network vhub route-map rule add --resource-group
                                   --route-map-name
                                   --vhub-name
                                   [--actions]
                                   [--match-criteria]
                                   [--name]
                                   [--next-step {Continue, Terminate, Unknown}]
                                   [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                   [--rule-index]
examples: az network vhub route-map rule add --name rule-name -g rg --route-map-name routemap-name --vhub-name vhub-name --match-criteria "[{matchCondition:Contains,routePrefix:[10.0.0.1/8]}]" --actions "[{type:Add,parameters:[{asPath:[22335]}]}]" --next-step Continue

commands.name: az network vhub route-map rule delete
commands.syntax:
az network vhub route-map rule delete --resource-group
                                      --route-map-name
                                      --rule-index
                                      --vhub-name
                                      [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                      [--yes]
examples: az network vhub route-map rule delete -g rg --route-map-name routemap-name --vhub-name vhub-name --rule-index 1

commands.name: az network vhub route-map rule list
commands.syntax:
az network vhub route-map rule list --resource-group
                                    --route-map-name
                                    --vhub-name
examples: az network vhub route-map rule list -g rg --route-map-name routemap-name --vhub-name vhub-name

commands.name: az network vhub route-map rule show
commands.syntax:
az network vhub route-map rule show --resource-group
                                    --route-map-name
                                    --rule-index
                                    --vhub-name
examples: az network vhub route-map rule show -g rg --route-map-name routemap-name --vhub-name vhub-name --rule-index 0

commands.name: az network vhub route-map rule wait
commands.summary: Place the CLI in a waiting state until a condition is met.
commands.syntax:
az network vhub route-map rule wait [--created]
                                    [--custom]
                                    [--deleted]
                                    [--exists]
                                    [--ids]
                                    [--interval]
                                    [--resource-group]
                                    [--route-map-name]
                                    [--subscription]
                                    [--timeout]
                                    [--updated]
                                    [--vhub-name]
